title: THSTI Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for Project Nurse III Posts
description: The Translational Health Science and Technology Institute (THSTI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Nurse III Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc Nursing can apply for the THSTI Notification 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selec...
